mapper.update: update t_seckill_user set seckill_remaining = seckill_remaining - 1, version = version + 1 where user_id = #{userId} and seckill_goods_id = #{seckillGoodsId} and seckill_remaining > 0 and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select seckill_goods_id, user_id,goods_id, seckill_count,seckill_remaining from t_seckill_user where user_id = #{userId} and seckill_goods_id = #{seckillGoodsId}
